籤詩版本二:
Zvinonzi hazvishamisi, zvipfeko zvakanaka uye muhoro wakanaka zvinozotungamira kubudiriro
Usarangarira zvakaitika kumashure.Uchiri kubvumirana neni.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi mufananidzo wemwana ari kuona amai vake.
Rombo rakanaka kuvanhu vese vanokudzwa.
解曰: Rinoshandiswa kuva netariro. Munhu wese anofara. Kubva kuvanhu. Semwanakomana asangana namai vake.
籤詩故事一:
◇Dong Zhong ari kutsvaga hama
Dong Zhong aive mwanakomana waDong Yong muHumambo hweHan. Akaberekwa kune ngano yakabva kudenga akauya pasi pano kuzoroora Dong Yong. Gare gare, mushure mekunge mwari abatsira Dong Yong kubhadhara zvikwereti zvake uye azvidzikinure, akadzokera kudenga.
Dong Zhong, aiva nemakore manomwe, aigara achinyadziswa nokuti akanga asina amai, saka aida kuvawana.
Achitungamirirwa naMnu Yi, Dong Zhong akaenda kuGomo reTaibai kunomutsvaga musi waJuly 7. Fairy yakaonekwa uye pakupedzisira yakaona amai vake.
聖意: Handina kugadzikana pamba ndiri munhuwo zvake, ndinonamatira rombo rakanaka, rombo rakanaka mubhizinesi, wanano uye wanano, mukadzi anofamba netsoka muLiujia arikuvharisa minda, makonye ari mudambudziko, zvinonetsa kuwana vanhu nekuda kwe kurasikirwa nezvipfuwo, kunonetsa kukwidza nyaya kumatare edzimhosva, kutama kuri kuchengetedzwa, pfuma yakarasika haina chinhu, zvirwere zviri kunamatira rombo rakanaka mumakomo nemakuva.
